header.title: Lexical Transformer
header.abstract: This document describes the lexical transformer of Cocoon.

s1.title: Lexical Transformer
s1.p: The lexical transformer tokenizes the content of special marked elements of a SAX stream, by using a lexicon file.

ul.li: Cacheable: yes - uses the last modification date of the lexicon document for validation.

s1.p: The lexer parses the following elements from the SAX stream, and replaces them through generated documents.
The lexical transformer will replace these elements by a list of lexemes (tokens).
s1.source: <lexemes xmlns="http://chaperon.sourceforge.net/schema/lexemes/1.0"> <lexeme symbol="..." text="..."/> <lexeme symbol="..." text="..."/> <lexeme symbol="..." text="..."/> </lexemes>
s1.p: A detailed explanation of function and the lexicon format can be found at Chaperon.
